wordGroup: skewed distribution 偏斜分布；偏态分布

sentences.en: The ball skewed off at a right angle.
sentences.cn: 球呈直角偏离弹了出去。

sentences.en: The car had ended up skewed across the road.
sentences.cn: 汽车最终斜着停在公路上。

sentences.en: The book is heavily skewed towards American readers.
sentences.cn: 这本书严重倾向于美国读者。
